about_the_game:
With the advent of Ragnarok, the Protoss forces are insufficient, and most of the Valkyries in the Hall of Valor are living in various parts of the continent as human beings. You must lift the seal on them to summon them.
This DLC contains 6 nude pictures of the characters. After completing the character level, you can view them in the gallery.

content_descriptors.notes:
all characters are over 18 years old.
The game contains nude pictures of characters and nude pictures of public scenes.
Please note that the content of the image may involve involuntary sex.

detailed_description:
With the advent of Ragnarok, the Protoss forces are insufficient, and most of the Valkyries in the Hall of Valor are living in various parts of the continent as human beings. You must lift the seal on them to summon them.
This DLC contains 6 nude pictures of the characters. After completing the character level, you can view them in the gallery.
name: Valhalla：Awakening of Valkyrie-Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
